org.apache.hama

Interface Constants

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BSPPeer<K1,V1,K2,V2,M>, BSPPeerProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BSPPeerImpl, GroomServer, LocalBSPRunner.LocalUmbilical, QuorumPeer

    public interface Constants
    Some constants used in the Hama.
